<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1cHJMVK"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/47abbed466b4a34bbeb31306aa3a968c/tumblr_inline_n68pjjRyNZ1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><span>Forum upgrades have begun! As the forum will be down for at least 48 hours (Squad time), be sure to get your <em>KSP</em> fix on <a href="http://bit.ly/1cHJMVK"><strong>REDDIT</strong></a>, where BioTronic’s spider sense tingled with this kethane rover. You can also join us on our official espernet IRC channel -</span><a class="_58cn" href="https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/kspofficial" data-ft='{"tn":"*N","type":104}'>#kspofficial</a></p>
A bit late xD. Good thing you still had the IRC listed in the notice though.
